Class Game

java.lang.Object
controller.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameEventListener
public class Game extends Object implements GameEventListener
Central game controller that orchestrates all other controllers and manages the overall game state.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Game(int level)
    Constructs a game instance configured for the specified level.
